titleStmt.title: [Howe Howleglas deseyued a wynedrawer in Lubeke]
Till Eulenspiegel. English.

notesStmt.note: Place of publication and printer's name from and publication date conjectured by STC.
Title from beneath woodcut on I4 recto.
Twenty-eight lines to the page, no catchwords.
Imperfect; a fragment of eight leaves.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
